title: Computer shuts down after playing a game
body: My computer shuts down and starts back up everytime after i finish a playing a game. it just started doing it last night.

replies.body: That's pretty strange. If your pc were shutting off mid-game it would lead me to think it might be overheating, but it's a little odd if it's taking place everytime you exit the game. Double check that your fans are all running decently to reduce any possible overheating, and make sure you go through the rest of the steps in [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684#wq7) as well.
